name: Batman: Arkham Knight
description:
Everything working fine on my Ubunut 20.04 LTS. 
My system specifications are:
i7- 7th Gen, 16GB RAM DDR4, 2 GB NvidiaGforce 1050

I was tried to install and it's done. But it's required more graphics. 1980MB usage and Utilization only 18-20% of Graphics ! RAM usage only 8GB !
